Text: 1. In Sokoban, your goal is to push all the magical crates onto the glowing stars.
2. Use your arcane powers to move your character with the arrow keys on your enchanted broomstick.
3. Beware! Once a crate is pushed, it cannot be pulled back. Plan your moves carefully.
4. Press 'Z' to undo your last move if you need to rethink your strategy.
5. Approach NPCs, solve their riddles, and you can save your progress.
6. If you ever get stuck, press 'R' to restart the challenge.
7. When you wish to return to the main menu, press 'M'.
8. May the magical spirits guide you. Press '0' to return to the main menu and begin your journey!
